overview: Edward Grey’s life has been on the downward spiral ever since the day of his death.  Not only must he deal with rising damp, bone decay and rot – but also the fact that he is now jobless, penniless and without girlfriend.  A documentary crew follows Ted around for a day providing intimate insight into the heart-wrenching world of the walking dead.  Life can bring many challenges… but death can be a bastard.
tagline: Ted is dead... but that's the least of his problems
title: Undead Ted
